subtitles:
185532 188202 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
188282 191372 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

192202 194872 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
209092 211592 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

220062 222902 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

222982 226822 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

226902 232162 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

232242 235702 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

244292 247462 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

249592 253892 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
253972 255562 We'll get you out of here.

255642 260312 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
277662 279792 Get it off! Get it off!

283422 286632 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

295302 298512 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1004182 1007062 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1015192 1017782 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1046432 1048682 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1078672 1083422 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1085592 1090812 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there. "
1090892 1094942 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1105532 1108452 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1115252 1118752 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1123342 1129762 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1129852 1133602 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1159172 1165422 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1165512 1169682 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1170552 1173312 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1173392 1178102 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1181982 1184822 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1187452 1189952 There was something in the blood.

1191412 1196372 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1203502 1206212 And that's when the exodus started.

1210432 1214102 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1216472 1219392 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1222362 1225322 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1227942 1232032 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1232112 1236412 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1237872 1240962 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1241582 1245752 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1264152 1268152 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1268232 1270822 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1285592 1290012 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1292512 1296602 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1300772 1304352 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1319042 1322202 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1486582 1490542 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1497002 1501512 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1504142 1509482 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1510102 1512482 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1512562 1515902 even though cash was completely useless.
1517442 1520572 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1526122 1528452 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1530622 1532962 I remember the ground was soft.

1534922 1539302 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1539382 1543342 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1543432 1547392 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1547472 1550812 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1552442 1555522 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1555612 1557982 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1560282 1565242 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1565322 1569202 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1583302 1588472 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1591142 1593982 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1594062 1597402 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1700082 1702382 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1711262 1713352 I'll start working on them, then.

1746802 1749762 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1749842 1752052 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1755302 1758222 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1796102 1798182 Do you have any clothes here?

1801272 1804942 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1805022 1808692 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1837472 1840472 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1840562 1844482 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1844562 1849942 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1850022 1854452 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1854532 1859662 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1859742 1865162 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1865252 1869462 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1869542 1874012 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world or just fall in love and fuck?
1876682 1879262 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1937992 1941122 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1941202 1944292 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1962222 1964312 Now I do need a break.

1984082 1989372 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1990582 1994842 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1997132 1999382 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1999472 2004552 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2010272 2013312 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2090682 2093682 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2093772 2096062 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2129472 2132562 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2147822 2150122 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2150202 2153242 Why don't you all sit down and...
2153332 2156292 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2156372 2158882 We've got Mum's crème de menthe.

2169842 2172852 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2172932 2175812 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2198582 2201672 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2230492 2236082 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2237752 2240002 You'll have to use the bucket.
2246552 2249172 Have to empty it each morning.

2249262 2252932 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2254802 2257932 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2271282 2273662 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2310362 2314072 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2315202 2318032 Probably need us more than we need them.

2329342 2334012 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2334092 2337852 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2342312 2345852 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2361912 2365162 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2367042 2371052 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2403242 2405332 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2405412 2409542 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2409632 2412842 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2429312 2433572 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2433652 2437402 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2453462 2456592 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2465512 2469272 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2469352 2473942 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2474022 2477032 If you can hear this, you're not alone.

2477112 2481612 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2481702 2483912 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2487372 2491962 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2495552 2499472 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2499552 2501932 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2502012 2504932 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2508682 2513482 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2519362 2525452 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2525532 2528702 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2528792 2531292 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2531372 2535332 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2537212 2541512 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2541592 2545092 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2545182 2549472 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2549562 2552392 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2552482 2556562 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2561032 2566742 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2570202 2575502 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2576212 2578292 So we have to try and get there.

2592432 2596192 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2624762 2627762 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2627842 2633102 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2650702 2653202 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2654082 2657462 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2657542 2661922 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2662002 2664922 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2700582 2703002 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2703092 2706422 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2708932 2711092 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2725692 2729242 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2761232 2765522 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2765612 2768862 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2775322 2780452 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2791342 2794262 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2807652 2810112 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2886602 2890192 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2890272 2892112 I think you can eat that raw.

2899782 2904292 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2909002 2912632 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2920722 2923972 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2978862 2981952 Either we do this now or we're walking.

3034172 3036842 Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3134982 3137772 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3213722 3216722 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3217562 3220352 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3281662 3285382 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3285462 3289632 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3290672 3294512 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3299022 3302272 Um... that's what you were thinking.
3305482 3307772 I was thinking I was wrong.

3319202 3323712 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3325082 3328542 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3331212 3334842 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3338472 3340972 See, that's what I was thinking.

3358742 3362752 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3391072 3393732 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3410542 3414422 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3414512 3418802 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3421512 3424102 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3424182 3427892 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3427982 3430232 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3442702 3445412 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3446502 3450502 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3527412 3530202 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3585512 3589012 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3589102 3594102 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3618672 3623172 Our location
is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3630642 3633682 The answer to Infection is here.
3670012 3673392 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3675222 3677562 No fire crews to put it out.

3808522 3812532 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3812612 3815742 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3822582 3827422 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3943832 3946752 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3946832 3949332 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4012562 4015232 Three survivors. One male, two female.
4015312 4018652 I repeat, one male, two female.

4083472 4088352 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4088432 4090852 So you can all have a shower.
4090932 4094272 You look like you need one. Please.

4114212 4119422 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
4128222 4131392 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

4143692 4147282 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4151122 4156122 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4156212 4160132 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4161422 4163842 I want her to be OK.
4165422 4167592 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4167682 4170472 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4210592 4214102 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4214182 4220312 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222732 4226902 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4231412 4235912 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4236292 4239212 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4239292 4242422 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4242502 4245592 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4255642 4261522 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4265232 4269492 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4269572 4274242 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4277492 4282422 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4282502 4284922 The belly of the house. The heart.

4285002 4290262 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4292512 4294642 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4294722 4297932 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4298012 4302062 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4304602 4307612 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4332012 4337092 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4344772 4348812 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4371502 4374922 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4386562 4391942 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4431692 4434152 ♪ You'll have to wait and see
4436572 4439162 ♪ We hope it's chips, it's chips
4455552 4458932 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4466522 4468982 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4469062 4472272 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4472362 4475482 but this omelette will do just as well.

4491042 4494962 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4495042 4498462 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4505432 4508222 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4509062 4514522 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4514612 4519152 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4519242 4522492 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4522572 4525412 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4525492 4529542 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4529622 4533962 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4534042 4537172 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4539262 4543382 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4544142 4546602 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4547602 4549892 that is a return to normality.

4553902 4556902 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4556982 4560232 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4563112 4568332 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4571122 4575252 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4578042 4582592 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4582672 4588142 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4588222 4591852 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4600152 4603112 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4606072 4609332 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4610242 4613372 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4617462 4619502 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4671302 4674932 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4691622 4693912 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4716562 4722192 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4722272 4724482 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4726282 4731572 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4733202 4735372 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4741582 4746092 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4753802 4756852 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4756932 4760392 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4770862 4773572 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776452 4779042 The rest of you, go with him.

4801432 4805652 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4805732 4807272 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4807362 4812532 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4819792 4822912 I killed... I killed a boy.

4834552 4839352 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4860332 4864122 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4865292 4870002 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4870092 4872962 What could I say to him?

4873052 4878262 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4879182 4883022 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4883102 4889232 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4906792 4908582 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4908672 4910752 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4916882 4918842 We get in the car and we go!

4920222 4924772 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4924852 4928102 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4928192 4930902 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4944832 4947162 I want to give you a chance.
4951002 4953292 But I can't let them go.

4981362 4984122 Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix. "

4984202 4987122 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers. "

4987202 4990122 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4990212 4993832 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4993922 4998342 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4998422 5001722 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5001802 5007522 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

5008562 5012602 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5013982 5017112 Just imagine, just think about it.
5018152 5020442 How could Infection cross the oceans?

5020532 5024822 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5024912 5027622 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5027702 5031712 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5036002 5039592 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5048352 5052732 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people. " He's insane!

5099272 5102402 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5103492 5108622 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5108702 5112622 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5116462 5118542 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5143532 5146952 Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.
5147032 5149532 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5149622 5152662 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

5155502 5158542 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5158622 5160542 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5160632 5164092 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5173392 5177352 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

5177442 5181612 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5182862 5185692 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5188202 5191412 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5201172 5203092 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5218562 5222022 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5261062 5265022 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5265112 5268692 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5268782 5271322 which she certainly has no use for.
5272322 5274162 You can't do it to Hannah.

5274242 5277952 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5291472 5294262 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5294342 5297682 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5316452 5320582 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5322462 5326172 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5326252 5330422 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5354202 5357072 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5380142 5384102 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5384182 5386352 Are you trying to kill me?
5388772 5391322 I'm making you not care. OK?
5403292 5405962 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5411792 5414382 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5644442 5646902 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5647952 5651912 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5654662 5657292 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5670472 5672972 I think they're having an effect.

5688532 5691412 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5692162 5695242 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5695332 5697332 Is that the way it works?

5700882 5704962 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5723902 5727032 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5727112 5729952 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5752012 5757562 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5765522 5768902 Don't just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5791342 5794302 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5820872 5824622 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6003342 6007722 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

6071122 6075922 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6076002 6080462 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6080552 6082882 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6147242 6149742 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6164012 6167552 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
6173312 6175812 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

6175892 6179232 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6187742 6191322 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
6191412 6193492 But I thought he was biting you.
6193582 6196252 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
6198582 6200712 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6299022 6301432 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6395152 6397822 You looked all right in this, you know.

6419472 6422812 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6478282 6481202 Do you think he saw us this time?
